bug.author: dslate
bug.summary: Broken link for "MXNet R Reference Manual"?
bug.description: On the MXNet page for the R API (<denchmark-link:http://mxnet.incubator.apache.org/api/r/index.html>http://mxnet.incubator.apache.org/api/r/index.html</denchmark-link> ) the link to the "MXNet R Reference Manual" seems to point to a document called "mxnet-test.pdf", whose contents are titled "MXNet Documentation Release 0.0.8" and seem to be for the Julia language, not R. Is this link incorrect, or am I just confused? I am looking for the MXNet R API. Thanks.

comments.comment:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/chetkhatri>@chetkhatri</denchmark-link> <denchmark-link:https://github.com/piiswrong>@piiswrong</denchmark-link>
Hi Eric and Chetan, do we have any way to recover the old R manual? Reference: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apache/incubator-mxnet/pull/6283>#6283</denchmark-link>
Duplicated Open Issue: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apache/incubator-mxnet/issues/7483>#7483</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/apache/incubator-mxnet/issues/6161>#6161</denchmark-link>

Do you want this file?
Lanking <notifications@github.com> 於 2018年4月5日 週四 02:05 寫道： <denchmark-link:#>…</denchmark-link>
@chetkhatri <https://github.com/chetkhatri> @piiswrong <https://github.com/piiswrong> Hi Eric and Chetan, do we have any way to recover the old R manual? Reference: #6283 <#6283> Duplicated Open Issue: #7483 <#7483> #6161 <#6161>
— You are receiving this because you commented. Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub <#8344 (comment)>, or mute the thread <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AOJIgR-tKH4imt8RAE_wrWfIkLYMeGwaks5tlQs5gaJpZM4P-swL> .

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/dslate>@dslate</denchmark-link> Hi, we have added the old R documentation in this PR. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apache/incubator-mxnet/pull/10473>#10473</denchmark-link>
Hope this helps.

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/lanking520>@lanking520</denchmark-link> Thanks, I was able to download the new R mxnet manual at <denchmark-link:https://s3.amazonaws.com/mxnet-prod/docs/R/mxnet-r-reference-manual.pdf>https://s3.amazonaws.com/mxnet-prod/docs/R/mxnet-r-reference-manual.pdf</denchmark-link> . However, the page I originally referenced, <denchmark-link:http://mxnet.incubator.apache.org/api/r/index.html>http://mxnet.incubator.apache.org/api/r/index.html</denchmark-link> , still contains a link titled 'MXNet R Reference Manual' that points to the wrong document (mxnet-test.pdf).
You are right. Once the PR merged, the link will be fixed.
Yes we can, the PR merged. The broken link should be fixed with next release
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/anirudh2290>@anirudh2290</denchmark-link> Please close this Issue. We have updated the link on the website and we will add more support on R this summer.
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/sandeep-krishnamurthy>@sandeep-krishnamurthy</denchmark-link> Could you please close this issue as it has been resolved
